room_title: Escape room "Mystery Manor" by Escape Room Lafayette in Lafayette
review: So fun! Did this with other managers for team building and had a great time. We played House of Assassination and I can't wait to go try the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Manor" by Escape Room Lafayette in Lafayette
review: We had a great time saving the president. I can't wait to try another room.

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Manor" by Escape Room Lafayette in Lafayette
review: I went with a group of 4 and we did the Assassination room. We escaped with 3 minutes left on the clock! We had a blast and can't wait to go back and try a different room.
